name: Portable Cobuntu
short_description:
This project builds on the Colinux kernel project and code from Portable Ubuntu.

http://www.colinux.org http://sourceforge.net/projects/portableubuntu/

The objective of the Portable Linux project is to experiment with new ways of integrating virtualization, cloud computing, desktop environments and remote computing. As time permits we plan to port distributions built with Colinux to Virtualbox OSE and similar open source platforms.

We currently offer 3 distributions licensed under the terms of GPL.

1. Basic secure Ubuntu Server, BIND9, LAMP and Email server stack. 2. Advanced Ubuntu Cloud instance using Orchestra Nagios, LAMP and Email server stack. 3. Server Desktop hybrid stacks combining server stacks and remote desktop tools like X2Go.
